title: Jodie Marsh blasted for putting up Christmas decorations 11 weeks early

Jodie Marsh once again couldn't contain her excitement ahead of December 25 as she put her festive decorations up 11 weeks early.

The former glamour model, 40, left fans totally shocked as she transformed her Essex home to exude extravagant Christmas spirit and festive flair as early as October.

Jodie was mocked by followers when she shared a slew of glittering snaps to Instagram on Tuesday evening.

(Image: Instagram)

The CBB star showed off how she turned her home into a very convincing Santa's grotto with numerous Christmas trees, a gigantic elf in an armchair and an elaborate Christmas village with music, lights and moving ornaments.

The reality TV babe was slammed by trolls who insisted it is too early for Christmas trees, but Jodie is a persistent decorator and defended her festive creativity.

She announced: "It’s Christmas in our house already. And that’s all that matters really. The village is bigger and better this year! Feast your eyes on this delight."

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Jodie gave viewers a glimpse of the 'village' with intricate Christmas train sets weaving their way around her lounge, artificial snow and a creepy Jigsaw character.

The bodybuilder then hit back at the fierce backlash. She said: "Studies show that people who put their Christmas decorations up early are happier."

Jodie showed off her "posh lounge tree" and another tree dedicated to her toyboy lover Billy Collins Nuttall, 23.

She shared: "The Star Wars and Harry Potter tree just for Billy (because he’s obsessed with both)

"Still more to go on but this is a good start!!"

(Image: Instagram)

The all-blue theme and the plush decorated house led fans to question why she was getting so excited for Christmas when there is over two months to go.

One user mocked: "Are you mental."

While another responded: "Stunning decorations but way too early.”

Many social media users also went wild over the fact that Jodie appeared to bypass Halloween .

One pointed out: "WTF it’s only just turned October. Not even had Halloween."

While another seemed disappointed: "What about Halloween??? Oh man I hate when people forget about Halloween."

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Jodie didn't seem fazed by the 'haters' as she took to Twitter to hit back at criticism.

She said: "Oh god the Christmas haters have started !!!! Hahahahahaha I LOVE that they get so irate.

"Like, why do they care when I put my decorations up? It genuinely amuses me that people get so angry."

She finished: "Me and Billy are like two pigs in shit over here at Marsh Manors. Enjoy folks."

Jodie is well known for her love of kickstarting Christmas early, and last October she was also mocked for putting up her decorations early.

(Image: Instagram)

In recent months, the busty model went public with her toyboy lover Billy and has been gushing over how perfect he is ever since.

The duo already look as if they have got very serious, with Elvis impersonator Billy and Jodie constantly sharing smitten snaps of each other on social media.

The relationship comes after Jodie's dramatic split from ex Wayne Lennox in January.

Jodie went public with Wayne after remaining single following breakdown of her marriage to James Placido in April 2016.
description: Once again the former glamour model couldn't contain her festive excitement as she put up her extravagant decorations in October
